amendment.description: At the end of the bill, before the short title, insert the following: SEC.___. Each amount made available by this Act (other than an amount required to be made available by a provision of law) is hereby reduced by 2.48 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding in the bill by 2.48 percent across-the-board.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanford amendment (A081) Failed by recorded vote: 134 - 290 (Roll no. 292).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Sanford amendment (A081) Failed by recorded vote: 134 - 290 (Roll no. 292).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A081) offered by Mr. Sanford.
